sentence.Network_en: People never tell someone he is bigwig, they only use expression behind his back.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们从来不对人说他是要人(bigwig), 只在背后说他.

sentence.Network_en: Today, the expression bigwig is used to make fun of a person who feels important.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天, “要人”(bigwig)的表达用于取笑一个自以为重要的人物.

sentence.Network_en: Gordon: Hackman has been a Hollywood bigwig for more than 40 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 戈登: 海克曼在好来坞走红已经四十多年了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: b开头的英文单词（6个字母）_百度知道 ... beggar 乞丐/使贫穷 bigwig 要人，大人物 believe 相信.
b开头的英文单词（6个字母）_百度知道 ... beggar 乞丐/使贫穷 bigwig 要人，大人物 believe 相信.
大字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 大号〖 tuba〗 大亨〖 magnate;bigwig;abigmerchant〗 大哄大嗡〖 makeaterrificdin〗.
公众人物 English, 翻译,... ... 人物描写 portrayal 头面人物 leading figure;bigwig 显赫人物 a luminary;a famous person.

list.abs: i just convinced a couple of bigwig donors ., 我只不过说服了几个大财主.

in South Korea a finance-ministry bigwig says his urgent priority is to persuade young ministry high-flyers , who invariably apply for an American posting , to go to India instead .韩国财务部一位要人说他的当务之急是说服那些抱负广大的年轻官员申请赴印度的职位，而此前他们一直是热衷于申请赴美国的职位。
it is said that Xiao Li's father a bigwig .据说小李的父亲是个大人物。
All these bigwigs think Ms Kagan is hot stuff ., 所有这些要人都认为卡根女士很优秀.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: so named from the large wigs formerly worn by distinguished men

entry.def: If you refer to an important person as a bigwig, you are being rather disrespectful.

means.word_mean: 1. the most important person in a group or undertaking
